Articles.Content: I bought Kerbal Space Program for xbox one, there is a way to activate the cheat menu like on pc? Thanks
Moved to Gameplay and Technical support, as it fit more in this sub-forum.

As far as I know no cheat menu is available for consoles. Really the game is no fun when you can go anywhere without any risk at all. IMO. If Squad is super duper nice they may give us our own cheat menu or set it as something that can only be used in Sandbox mode. Dont get your hopes up though. Happy crashing!
